name: Ultimate Package Simulator (Columbia College Chicago)
description:
You have 60 seconds to reach all the drop-off points. Use arrow keys or WSADto move. Lose 5 seconds if you hit a car. Get as many points as you can before time runs out. Good luck!

Suggested resolution: 1920 x 1080

This game was created in 24 hours during Columbia College Chicago's Manifest Game Jam. All assets (except the font) were created from scratch during this time.

Eric Clayton, Dave Majchrowicz - Art

Nathan Bowdish - Programming

Victoria Rose Maxfield - Sound / Composition

Mac Bearse - Level Design
